title: Can You Imagine Lying About Your Mother's Death For Political Reasons? | The Joe Pags Show | KPRC AM 950
text:
Can You Imagine Lying About Your Mother's Death For Political Reasons? posted by The Joe Pags Show - 2 hours ago share Mike Hager, an Iraqi whose story has gone viral, told reporters that his mom died because of the executive order President Trump put in place. 
According to WJBK , “ The leader of a mosque in Dearborn has confirmed to FOX 2 that a man who claimed his mother died in Iraq after being barred from returning to the United States under a ban instituted by President Trump this weekend, lied to FOX 2 about when her death occurred.” Heard 5-8pm Central the Joe Pags Show has been a San Antonio staple and a fan favorite since 2007. Pags started his career in radio in 1989 in Palm Beach County, Florida before making his way to the TV anchor desk in Saginaw/Flint, Grand Rapids/Kalamazoo, and Lansing, Michigan then moving on to New York. From there he was called back to radio and landed at the Clear Channel Talk Flagship, WOAI in 2005. Pags has won multiple Associated Press awards for excellence in journalism in both Michigan and New York. Michigan Association of Broadcasting award-winner and has been cited by the US House of Representatives and the State of Michigan for his broadcasts following the attacks of 9/11. The show is nationally syndicated to more than 70 stations and is seen on NewsmaxTV nationally. Along with his syndicated daily show, Pags hosts Premiere’s nationally syndicated “The Weekend w/Joe Pags.” Pags is a member of Talkers Magazine’s “Heavy Hundred,” and his show was recently named to the NewsMax list of the most influential local talk shows in the country.
